Our university has a team of highly qualified faculty members. You can find more information about our faculty here.
Our university has a well-defined admission process. You can find detailed information about the admission process, eligibility criteria, required documents, and deadlines on our admissions page.
Our university offers a vibrant campus life with a wide range of facilities, clubs, organizations, student activities, and support services. You can explore more about campus life here.

patterns: Tell me about the available courses
responses: Our university offers a wide range of courses including Computer Science, Engineering, Business Administration, Psychology, Biology, and more. You can explore the complete list of courses on our courses page.

patterns: What do I need to apply?
responses: To be eligible for admission, you need to meet certain requirements including academic qualifications, standardized test scores, and submission of necessary documents. The specific admission requirements can be found on our admission requirements page.

patterns: How can I apply for a scholarship?
responses: Our university provides various scholarship opportunities to deserving students. You can find detailed information about the available scholarships, eligibility criteria, and application process on our scholarships page.

patterns: How much does it cost to study at your university?
responses: The tuition fees may vary depending on the program and student category. You can find detailed information about the tuition fees, fee payment options, and financial aid opportunities on our fees and financial aid page.

Our university provides on-campus accommodation for students. We offer a range of housing options with various facilities. You can find more information about accommodation and the application process on our accommodation page.

patterns: Can I have a campus tour?
How can I schedule a campus visit?
responses: We offer campus tours for prospective students and visitors. To schedule a campus visit, please fill out the form on our campus tour page. Our staff will get in touch with you to confirm the details.
I did not understand that.

The academic calendar includes important dates such as the start of the semester, registration deadlines, exam schedules, and holidays. You can find the complete academic calendar for the current academic year on our academic calendar page.

patterns: What student services do you offer?
responses: We provide a range of student services to support your academic and personal success. These services include counseling, career guidance, health services, library facilities, student clubs and organizations, and more. You can explore the various student services on our student services page.

patterns: Are there research opportunities for students?
responses: We encourage students to participate in research activities. We offer various research opportunities, including undergraduate research programs and collaborations with faculty members. You can find more information about research opportunities and ongoing projects on our research opportunities page.

Our university provides comprehensive career services to help students with job placement, internships, resume building, interview preparation, and career development. You can learn more about our career services and upcoming events on our career services page.

patterns: How do I apply for admissions?
responses: To apply for admissions, please visit our admissions page. It provides detailed information about admission requirements, the application process, admission deadlines, and any required entrance exams.

patterns: What financial aid options are available?
responses: We offer various financial aid options, including scholarships, grants, loans, and work-study programs. To learn more about the financial aid opportunities available at our university, please visit our financial aid page.

We provide on-campus housing options for students. Our residence halls offer comfortable and convenient living spaces. To learn more about housing options and the application process, please visit our housing page.

patterns: What is student life like on campus?
responses: Student life on our campus is vibrant and diverse. We have a wide range of student clubs and organizations, offering opportunities for involvement in various interests and hobbies. Additionally, we organize events, campus activities, and provide sports and recreation facilities. You can explore more about student life on our student life page.

patterns: What academic programs do you offer?
responses: We offer a wide range of academic programs, including undergraduate and graduate programs. Our programs cover various disciplines, and you can choose from a variety of majors and minors. To explore our academic programs and their requirements, please visit our academic programs page.

To get the latest weather information, you can check a reliable weather website or use a weather app on your smartphone. They provide real-time weather updates, forecasts, and temperature details for your location.

patterns: Can you tell me the time?
responses: To know the current time, you can check the clock on your device or use a world clock website or app. They provide accurate time information for different time zones.

To get directions to a specific destination, you can use a navigation app like Google Maps. Simply enter your current location and the destination, and it will provide you with step-by-step directions and estimated travel time.

patterns: What programs does ENSA Khouribga offer?
How do I contact ENSA Khouribga?
How can I get admission in ENSA Khouribga?
responses: ENSA Khouribga is a Moroccan public engineering school within the Sultan Moulay Souliman University of Beni Mellal, created in 2007. It offers programs in Computer engineering, Telecommunication and Networks engineering, Engineering Processes for Energy and the Environment, and Electrical engineering. The admission is done based on the average obtained in the baccalaureate and a written test for preselected candidates. You can also integrate the school in the Engineer Cycle at the bac+2 level via a competition. The school's contact email is contact.ensak@usms.ma and the telephone number is (+212) 523492335 or (+212) 618534372. The school is located at École Nationale des Sciences AppliquéesBd Béni Amir BP 77 Khouribga - Maroc, Khouribga, Maroc.

patterns: How can I contact ENSA Khouribga?
What is the contact info for ENSA Khouribga?
I need to get in touch with ENSA Khouribga
responses: You can contact ENSA Khouribga through the following: Website: http://ensak.usms.ac.ma/ensak/, Email: contact.ensak@usms.ma, Phone: (+212) 523492335/ (+212) 618534372. The address is École Nationale des Sciences AppliquéesBd Béni Amir BP 77 Khouribga - Maroc, Khouribga, Maroc.

patterns: What courses does ENSA Khouribga offer?
Tell me about the courses at ENSA Khouribga
What programs are available at ENSA Khouribga?
What fields of study are at ENSA Khouribga?
responses:
ENSA Khouribga offers various programs including Computer Engineering, Telecommunication and Networks Engineering, Engineering Processes for Energy and the Environment, Electrical Engineering, Data Engineering and Networks, and Process Engineering. The study duration is 5 years for these engineering programs. 

**Source 1**: [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/%C3%89cole_nationale_des_sciences_appliqu%C3%A9es_de_Khouribga)

**Source 2**: [TawjihMaroc](https://www.tawjihmaroc.com/school/61)

**Source 3**: [ENSAK](https://ensak.usms.ac.ma/ensak/formation-initiale/)

patterns: How can I get into ENSA Khouribga?
What is the admission process for ENSA Khouribga?
Tell me about the ENSA Khouribga entrance exam
How to apply to ENSA Khouribga?
responses:
Admission to ENSA Khouribga is based on a selection process that involves a written exam for pre-selected candidates based on their baccalaureate results. It's also possible to integrate into the Engineering Cycle after two years of post-BAC studies via a competitive exam. Students from preparatory classes, DUT, DEUG or Licences from Faculties of Sciences (FS) and Faculties of Sciences and Techniques (FST) are eligible for this. Admission is also possible for students who have obtained a Master's degree.

**Source 1**: [Etudiant](https://www.etudiant.ma/etablissements/ensa-khouribga/concours)

**Source 2**: [ENSAK](https://ensak.usms.ac.ma/ensak/formation-initiale/)

patterns: What is the academic structure at ENSA Khouribga?
How are the courses structured at ENSA Khouribga?
Tell me about the course structure at ENSA Khouribga
What is the curriculum at ENSA Khouribga?
responses:
The academic structure at ENSA Khouribga is divided into two phases. The first two years are preparatory, providing solid knowledge in mathematics, physics, and an introduction to computer science. The next three years, known as the Engineering Cycle, consist of six semesters of specialized training leading to an Engineering degree. Each semester includes 6 to 8 modules, and the university year is composed of two semesters with 16 to 18 weeks of teaching and evaluation. The last semester is dedicated to an end-of-study project, which includes a professional internship. ENSA Khouribga also offers a Master's program that lasts two years and consists of four semesters.

**Source**: [ENSAK](https://ensak.usms.ac.ma/ensak/formation-initiale/)

patterns: How can I get admitted to ENSA Khouribga?
What is the admission process for ENSA Khouribga?
What do I need to get into ENSA Khouribga?
responses: Admission to ENSA Khouribga is based on a preselection of candidates based on the general average obtained at the baccalaureate. A written exam is then conducted for preselected candidates. It's also possible to join the Engineering Cycle at ENSA Khouribga at the bac+2 level via a competitive exam. The formation then lasts 3 years after 2 years post-BAC. This type of admission is open to students of preparatory classes, DUT, DEUG or Licenses from Faculties of Sciences (FS) and Faculties of Science and Technology (FST). Admission to the 2nd year of the Engineering Cycle (4th year) is possible for students who have obtained a Master's degree.

patterns: What courses are offered at ENSA Khouribga?
What are the study programs at ENSA Khouribga?
responses: ENSA Khouribga offers the following engineering programs: Computer Engineering, Telecommunication and Networks Engineering, Engineering Processes for Energy and the Environment, Electrical Engineering, Data Engineering and Computer Science, Network Engineering and Computer Science. The duration of study for these programs is 5 years.

patterns: How can I get to ENSA Khouribga?
responses: ENSA Khouribga is located at École Nationale des Sciences AppliquéesBd Béni Amir BP 77 Khouribga - Maroc, Khouribga, Maroc.

patterns: How can I contact ENSA Khouribga?
responses: You can contact ENSA Khouribga through the following: Site: http://ensak.usms.ac.ma/ensak/, Email: contact.ensak@usms.ma, Phone: (+212) 523492335/ (+212) 618534372.

patterns: Does ENSA Khouribga offer master's programs?
responses: ENSA Khouribga offers a master's program that spans over two years and comprises four semesters. The first two semesters consist of fundamental studies specific to the character of the Master. Semesters 3 and 4 are semesters of deepening, specialization, and initiation to research for the Master, or of deepening, specialization, and professionalization for the specialized Master.

patterns: What career opportunities does ENSA Khouribga provide?
responses: Graduates of ENSA Khouribga have numerous professional opportunities in various sectors such as study and consulting offices, industries, the automotive energy field, network and computer science, and the public and private sectors.

patterns: What are the admission criteria for ENSA Khouribga?
How to get admission in ENSA Khouribga?
responses: Admission to ENSA Khouribga is based on the following: preselection of candidates based on the average grade obtained at the baccalaureate, and a written contest for preselected candidates. It is also possible to integrate into the Engineering Cycle at the bac+2 level through a competition, with the formation then lasting 3 years after 2 years post-BAC. This type of admission is open to students from preparatory classes, DUT, DEUG, or Licenses from the Faculties of Science (FS) and Faculties of Science and Techniques (FST). Admission in the 2nd year of the Engineering Cycle (4th year) is possible for students who have obtained a Master's degree.

patterns: What is the curriculum at ENSA Khouribga?
What subjects are taught at ENSA Khouribga?
responses: ENSA Khouribga's curriculum is spread over five years: two preparatory years and three years of the engineering cycle. The first two years enable students to acquire solid knowledge in mathematics and physics, as well as an introduction to computer science. The engineering cycle is a higher education training curriculum lasting six semesters. Each semester includes 6 to 8 modules. The five first semesters of engineering training consist of three blocks of modules: scientific and technical base and specialization modules, management modules, and languages, communication, and ICT modules. The sixth semester is dedicated to the end-of-study project (PFE).

patterns: What is the final year project at ENSA Khouribga?
What does the end-of-study project at ENSA Khouribga involve?
responses: The final year project at ENSA Khouribga is a stage relative to the end-of-study project (PFE). This stage allows students to experience professional life and adapt theoretical knowledge to industrial reality, to carry out a synthesis work, to develop initiative and group work, and to strengthen bibliographic research, which facilitates the professional integration of future graduates.
